title: Any lawful use of land/building premises existing before the coming into force of these Regulations may continue even after redevelopment/reconstruction of land/building even if it does not conform to the use provisions of these Regulations provided such non- conforming use is not extended or enlarged except as provided in these Regulations
clause_text: Any lawful use of land/building premises existing before the coming into force of these Regulations may continue even after redevelopment/reconstruction of land/building even if it does not conform to the use provisions of these Regulations provided such non- conforming use is not extended or enlarged except as provided in these Regulations.
